feedback: The staff was very professional and caring. The doctors took time to explain everything clearly.
The hospital was clean and well-organized. The waiting time was minimal, and the nurses were very kind.
Had a great experience at the emergency department. Quick response and excellent medical attention.
The billing process was smooth, but the appointment scheduling could be improved for better efficiency.
The facilities are top-notch, but there was a long wait time for specialist consultations.
